fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: Marina Kostalevsky is editor, not co-editor, of the new volume of Tchaikovsky letters (“Tchaikovsky and the secret gay loves censors tried to hide”, News, last week, page 15). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
